WRITING.TITLE: What trend in music just needs to go away?

WRITING.TEXT: OK Computer announced to those who missed The Bends that those "Creep" guys were more than just one-hit wonders. The evolution in four years from their first album (Pablo Honey) to OK Computer is stunning. For those who weren't there, 1997 was when The Spice Girls and Puff Daddy ruled the charts.

WRITING.TEXT: TIL that Pontiac doesn't exist anymore. The first car I ever owned was a blue 1993 Pontiac Sunbird. Hated that car, but at least it was mine.

Took the photo with my iPhone and then ran it through a few filters on an app called Snapseed. Also straightened it a little bit. In the original photo, there isn't much blue. It's more gray and brown, so one of the filters enhanced the blue.
The air temp that day was probably around 12C / 54F. No idea how cold the water was, but I wasn't about to get too close to it. The waves were a little intense.
Drive by car from southern Yokohama to Yokosuka. Takes about 25 minutes in the morning and about 35-40 minutes coming back. Could take trains, but the car is much more comfortable.

WRITING.TITLE: Beach near my daughter's preschool in Hayama. Was a bit windy that day.
